about_the_game:
Trade City is a simple city building game that you build your own city by building/developing new buildings.Grow your city with production and trade, and conquer other cities on the map without fighting.

Build & Grow



There are various structures in the game: houses, parks and workshops... Use these structures to increase your population and produce. Do not neglect to improve your structures and make your people happy. Remember, happy workers mean more production and taxes.

Production



Listen to the needs of your people and the world. Offer what is demanded.
Produce products with high added value and earn more, always win!

Rule !



Trade with other cities. Send gifts from time to time and please their hearts. Be with them in difficult times. Become the beloved of the people's. Influence them.
That's the only way you can rule them.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel i3 4330 , AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks 10.9 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Trade City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 + , 64 bits required
  • Processor: Intel i3 4330 , AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 560 : AMD Radeon Hd 8950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 , 64 bits required
  • Processor: Intel i5 9300H : AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 1050 : AMD RX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Trade City is a simple city building game that you build your own city by building/developing new buildings.Grow your city with production and trade, and conquer other cities on the map without fighting.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
